author: Staff Reporter
text:
It was a rare opportunity for the alumni of St. Francis Xavier School, Thoothukudi, when they gathered for the ‘Old Boys’ Meet’ on Monday evening.

After a long gap of 50 years, theyreunited and shared nostalgic remembrances of their good old days of schooling here.

During the three-hour programme held at All India Chamber of Commerce and Industries Hall, they recalled how they were taught lessons by their teachers and the methods adopted in learning in classroom.

Some of them also expressed the characteristic features of their teachers while dealing with students. They posed for group photos and also clicked snaps with their cell phones.

J.P. Joe Villavarayar, convener of the programme, said that it was a great pleasure to see the alumni after a long time.

He recalled the high qualities of Fr. C.V. Mattan, former Headmaster of the school. Fifty four alumni from the 1966 SSLC batch gathered at the venue, he added.
title: Schoolmates meet after 50 years
